subject: From Juscelino Rodrigues Tavares; Re: Your Investment Inquiry
body:
Dear Mr. Christopher,

I write to acknowledge your email response in regards to my earlier email about business funding and other financial matters generally..

In furtherance to my earlier email, I wish to again explain that I am a Broker or a Consulting Representative if you like to call it by that name. My job as a middle person in the chain of funding requirements is to bring both the funding company and the company that needs the fund together. The funding firm cannot deal with me (in a client's behalf) because I am only a 3rd party. As a Broker. I syndicate funds from many sources depending on where there is availability, and then bring together the fund owners and companies that need them in direct contact.

Right now, one of them is the McGibbs, an Australian registered firm operating as a traditional financial company, giving loans and investments in direct US $$$ through a direct wire transfer via any of their affiliate's banks in Australia, USA or New Zealand. I can also link you up with a Private Investor which would have less exposure for publicity of his activities with you. I would appraise and know the best pairing for you as we progress.

On your funding, perhaps if you have or can, I will request for the pdf copy of the business plan/or executive summary of the business project in question for review and expression of opinion by the investor before I can pair you with the firm.

Better still, you can fill out/complete and return the Know Your Customer (KYC) information as follows:

Full Names :................................
Full Address:...............................
Present Business Name:........................
Nature of Present Business:....................
Mobile/Contact Telephone No. :................
Investment/Loan Amount :.............................
Purpose of Requested Loan :.........................

Once it is evaluated positively, I will then link you directly to the firm. At that point, your technical questions, conducting of your due diligence and every other information that you may need to make you satisfied with the process shall be answered directly by the firm. I hope to hear back from you as requested.

Yours Sincerely,
Juscelino Rodrigues Tavares
===============
Hello Juscelino Rodrigues Tavares,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the opportunity
to potentially collaborate with your group of investors. Can
you provide more information on the types of funding options
available, such as Loans, Equity, Hedge Funds? Additionally,
could you share some examples of successful projects that your
investors have funded in the past? I am interested in learning
more about how we can work together on potential projects in
various industries.
Looking forward to your response.
Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: From Juscelino Rodrigues Tavares; Re: Your Investment Inquiry
body:
Hello Juscelino Rodrigues Tavares,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided regarding business funding and financial matters. Can you please provide more details on the types of funding options available through your group of investors? I am particularly interested in learning about options like Loans, Equity, and Hedge Funds.

Additionally, could you share some examples of successful projects that your investors have funded in the past? This would help me understand the kind of projects that are typically supported by your network.

I am keen on exploring how we can potentially collaborate on projects in various sectors. Looking forward to your response with more insights.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Funding Options & NDA Protocol
body:
Dear Mr. Christopher,

Your email is received.

The funding options available with the Investors I am presently working with are mainly on Loans or Equity, and while I have a few that do the both, I don't have any presently that is seriously into Hedge Funds.

subject: Re: Funding Options & NDA Protocol
body:
Thank you for sharing that information. Can you provide more details on the loan and equity options available with the investors? How does the process work for someone interested in exploring these funding options?

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Please start with providing the following
body:
Dear Mr. Christopher,

Please start with:

1.  Providing a pdf copy of the business plan/or executive summary of the particular business project in question for review and expression of opinion by the investor.

2. You should fill out/complete and return the Know Your Customer (KYC) information as follows:

Full Names :................................
Full Address:...............................
Present Business Name:........................
Nature of Present Business:....................
Mobile/Contact Telephone No. :................
Investment/Loan Amount :.............................
Purpose of Requested Loan :.........................

With those received, it will allow me to assess the particular project, submit the requests to the funders that would be more disposed to funding the particular project, then the one(s) that are accepting of it will let me know. Once agreed, I will then link you directly to the firm. At that point, your technical questions, conducting of your due diligence and every other information that you may need to make you satisfied with the process shall be answered directly by the firm.

Yours Sincerely,
Juscelino Rodrigues Tavares

subject: Re: Please start with providing the following
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information. Could you please provide more details about the business project and the potential investment opportunity? I'm interested in learning more about how the process works and what kind of projects are typically funded.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Please start with providing the following
body: Sorry, I have other important things to devote my time to. Do get back to me when you are really up for the funding.

subject: Re: Please start with providing the following
body:
No problem at all! I completely understand that you have other priorities. Just out of curiosity, what kind of funding are you looking for? Maybe I can help point you in the right direction.

Best wishes,
Christopher
